extendedInfo.description: â Space Sci-fi Strategy game- Cosmic Kingdom has been released âCosmic Kingdoms takes place in the universe with dynamic action strategy genre. Itâs time to build your own empire. You will have to collect natural resource, construct space buildings and expand your space territory. Make your empire stronger. Cosmic Kingdom takes place in the universe with dynamic MMO (Massive Multiplayer Online) space sci-fi strategy game. Cosmic Kingdom is all about âfleets which you can design your ownâ and âyou can invade other userâs planetsâ. Gamers with a lust for giant starship fleets pounding the crap out of each other with missiles and beam weapons. This game is not a tactical game, it is a strategy one. âPlayers must design the fleets that will fight for your own kingdoms glory in the depths of universe.â.Itâs time to build your own kingdom.  ============Introduction============Cosmic Kingdoms is a real-time strategy simulation type game based on universe. You can select one of three races and lead your kingdom towards the space and command your forces to the victory.============Features============â This game has completely different three unique space races -Powerful scientific technology based on âHand of Godâ weapon was developed by Acron! -We worship on power and invincible is the most militant tribes to our race Bellico!-We survived from the ancient earth and we strictly pursue on economic interests only. We are Shrewdo!      Select your race with your taste! â4 types of filed with hundreds of science technology research-Economic development research is one of our core researches and it allows your empire to grow faster economic growth!- Military power research allows your empire to make large scale of Military power for those who dream about the power- Science weapon research is for Beam, Canon, and Missile, combat ship and high tech science and advanced science - Engine, armor, special devices, such as the structure for Fleet spaceship research!Customize fleet in your own style~â Design your own Fleet with Fleet design system Through Scientific research, you can configure numerous weapons. You can upgrade engine, armor, special device by combining each of your fleet. Build your own strategic fleet. Complete your own strategy with your Fleet~âEach users will begin to fight with our war system. âInvade other userâs planetâ. reviews.title: Very good!
reviews.comment: Brilliant simple mmo finally my search is over! Smooth gameplay well finished one major improvement though would be a sd card storage option as it takes up a lot of memory keep up the good work
reviews.author: Liam Denton

reviews.title: Yeah....
reviews.comment: Just been attacked by the same player 38 times in a row, counted my reports. No way to defend myself.
reviews.author: Gareth Wright

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: Just needs player guilds/player guild v guild wars, maybe even a fleet sector control. Would really make this game epic. If you like this check out. Pocket galaxy, blows this game out the water, it\'s in closed beta atm though  but keep posted on it.
reviews.author: Carlisle Stanford

reviews.title: Kills other apps
reviews.comment: After I installed this app, other apps are killed after a few mins if using them. Apparently cosmic kingdoms has the permissions to kill other apps at will. Uninstalled until this permission is removed
reviews.author: Giannis Loruth

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Perfect. I love it, its like mass effect it just needs more skills and weapons and needs like more races and alot more planets and solar systems, love it though keep updates coming, and let us move it to SD card takes most of my internal memory
reviews.author: Shawn Longsden

reviews.title: Just started playing
reviews.comment: I\'m about 2 minutes in, so this isn\'t so much about gameplay. But the grammar is horrible. Please hire someone to fix that, and to give the tutorial an update. The tutorial asks you to complete certain objectives, but usually doesn\'t tell you HOW. And doesn\'t tell you how to get back to the main screen so you can complete the tutorial missions.
reviews.author: Steve Freeman

reviews.title: Good game...
reviews.comment: Worth the download if you like these types of games.
reviews.author: Rob Mahoney

reviews.title: Great game, very addictive
reviews.comment: But I find the game freezing after combat often, might just be on Transformer Prime though. Edit: Game freeze happens after every second combat is resolved. Edit2: cannot toggle off sound and notifications.  imo game is imbalanced at higher level, gated research advancement and the ability to attack players several levels and tech lower makes the game less appealing at high 20\'s.  Would consider this a 4 star app without bugs noted above.
reviews.author: Leonard Kohn

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Crashes a lot on all my phones but it\'s ap-based so doesn\'t actually matter. Great fun otherwise when you put the time in. The Action Point system means you can\'t play constantly or lose out to people who do and you have time to form a strategy. I\'ve tried hundreds of games and this is the only one I keep coming back to and is on several devices. Says it all...
reviews.author: Matt Welford

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: I do like this but the frequency of wars renders you unable to progress unless you spend money . I\'ve been playing for weeks now but may be deleting soon as the enjoyment  is swiftly  waning. Please fix
reviews.author: Paul Duke

reviews.title: Great and addictive
reviews.comment: Very good game which has me addicted for a gew days now. Only wish there was more to do, more player interaction and less game freezes - like sometimes I am unable to do anything except quit, this happen a lot before I am able to invade.... will be five stars if these are resolved.
reviews.author: Vincent H\303\253nn

reviews.title: Amit das
reviews.comment: Vry nce n cool game..awsme quality and graffics...good game, Game of the year.
reviews.author: Amit Das

reviews.title: Great game but
reviews.comment: Awesome game, great time killer. Although reboots game on me every four battles. Gets annoying, also crashes randomly often.
reviews.author: Gene Pascua

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Fun, at your own pace. Its war, so don\'t be a wuss when your attacked and don\'t give a bad rating cause you stink at it :p
reviews.author: Marcia S

reviews.title: Gameplay encourages farming/feeding
reviews.comment: Interface is nice. Tutorial messages block you from interacting with the game. Game often locks up when attempting to invade. The display of win/loss encourages attacking those who are beaten already because combat losses out weigh loot in wins. Attack the undefend and get loot from insta surrender. Gameplay is similar to lots of games. Only thing unique is you design ships but this feels superficial due to limited slots & devices/weapons. Game feels boring; like there\'s no goal/objective/point.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: This along with galactic heros are great games I play for hours. Its little like archspace
reviews.author: Carlos Cordova

reviews.title: EPIC GAME BUT GLITCHES
reviews.comment: I enjoy this game, the graphics, the strategy, and the all around mold of its design of futuristic warfare . But it lags and it freezes a lot. I have a Galaxy S 2 If that makes a difference. Please fix this bug.
reviews.author: Imani Porter

reviews.title: Do not download!!! .wasted my $5
reviews.comment: Game suck!!! Every time I kill half of enemy fleet while defending n I still loose. They want u to keep spending money. Its a con game!!!! There is no way u can play for free. nice but laggy on 1.5 Ghz and keep crashing. Big bullys keep looting your resources n u cant put them on bounty as their is no option.
reviews.author: Nabeel Qureshi

reviews.title: Good game but developers will rip you off!
reviews.comment: I enjoyed the game until I decided to pay for some extra crystals. I received nothing but they took my money. I have been emailing for 3day\'s but still no reply. Play a different game by a trusted dev.
reviews.author: Liam Flood

reviews.title: Funny game
reviews.comment: Needs te be updated badly. no social support and alot of  major bugs and bad translation.
reviews.author: Terenz Khaos
